events.message: I just received my order today, but the laptop screen is scratched and it does not turn on properly.
The reported problem has been categorized under Product Defect due to the mention of a scratched screen and malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support agents to assist you further.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the scratched screen and the issue with powering on. I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and any error messages you see when attempting to turn the laptop on?
Attached are some photos showing the deep scratches clearly, and it just blinks the power light without booting up.
Thank you for the photos. We can send a replacement unit immediately or arrange a technician visit to inspect and repair the damage at no cost.
I would prefer a replacement unit as soon as possible. Thanks for your quick response and help.
We have processed the replacement order. You will receive a shipment confirmation shortly and a return label for the defective laptop.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and if everything is working fine now.
Yes, I received the replacement and it works perfectly. Thanks again for the support!
We are glad to hear that your issue is resolved. We are closing this case now, and do let us know if you need further assistance.
